title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the antiderivative

1 point is earned for the answer

∫ −2π 4π f(x) dx= ∫ −2π 4π ( g(x)−cos( x 2 ) ) dx                     =6 π 2 − [ 2sin( x 2 ) ] x=−2π x=4π                     =6 π 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@9051@
